sql.value: select a.id, a.file_suffix, a.create_time, a.is_share, a.file_name, a.file_size, a.update_time, b.username, b.nickname from sys_file a left join sys_user b on (a.create_by = b.id) where a.is_deleted = 0 #[and a.file_suffix = :fileSuffix] #[and a.file_name like :fileName] #[and a.create_by = :userId] #[and a.create_time between :beginTime and :endTime] order by a.id desc
